about_the_game:
Enjoy a heartwarming farm life while growing crops and interacting with animals!

This title is a port of a title released in 2007 for feature phones in the popular series, which has been developed for numerous hardware platforms.

It simultaneously includes “for Boy,” in which a boy is the main character, and “for Girl,” in which a girl is the main character.

Enjoy ranch life while cultivating crops, raising cows and sheep on the farm, mining, and growing beautiful flowers in the flower garden!

While running a ranch, you can deepen your relationship with the people in the village and get married if you get to know them well.

Find your favorite partner from the different villagers in the “for Boy” and “for Girl” categories!

◆Farm

Plowing, seeding, watering, fertilizing and harvesting crops.

◆Ranch

You can raise livestock such as cows, sheep and chickens. You can also get eggs and milk products.

◆Village

You can sell your harvest. You can buy seeds and animals.

There is also a blacksmith where you can cast tools. Above all, in the village you will find your future marriage partner.

◆Mine

You can excavate gems, ores and power stones.

◆Flower Garden

You can cultivate flowers and medicinal herbs. Medicinal herbs are valuable as medicine.

◆Home

I live with my mother. You can check the status.

Enjoy a heartwarming farm life while growing crops and interacting with animals!

This title is a port of a title released in 2007 for feature phones in the popular series, which has been developed for numerous hardware platforms.

It simultaneously includes “for Boy,” in which a boy is the main character, and “for Girl,” in which a girl is the main character.

Enjoy ranch life while cultivating crops, raising cows and sheep on the farm, mining, and growing beautiful flowers in the flower garden!

While running a ranch, you can deepen your relationship with the people in the village and get married if you get to know them well.

Find your favorite partner from the different villagers in the “for Boy” and “for Girl” categories!

◆Farm

◆Ranch

There is also a blacksmith where you can cast tools. Above all, in the village you will find your future marriage partner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
